channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Tsinghua University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: 3D Structure Prediction of Atomic Systems with Flow-based Direct Preference Optimization
item.description: FlowDPO: Revolutionizing 3D structure prediction with flexible probability paths & Direct Preference Optimization for enhanced accuracy and reduced hallucinations.

item.title: AdaPKC: PeakConv with Adaptive Peak Receptive Field for Radar Semantic Segmentation
item.description: AdaPKC upgrades PeakConv for superior radar semantic segmentation by dynamically adjusting its receptive field, outperforming current state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: Aligning Diffusion Behaviors with Q-functions for Efficient Continuous Control
item.description: Efficient Diffusion Alignment (EDA) leverages pretrained diffusion models and Q-functions for efficient continuous control, exceeding all baselines with minimal annotation.

item.title: AlphaTablets: A Generic Plane Representation for 3D Planar Reconstruction from Monocular Videos
item.description: AlphaTablets revolutionizes 3D planar reconstruction from monocular videos with its novel rectangle-based representation featuring continuous surfaces and precise boundaries, achieving state-of-the-ar…

item.title: AMOR: A Recipe for Building Adaptable Modular Knowledge Agents Through Process Feedback
item.description: AMOR: Adaptable Modular knowledge agent using LLMs, excels with FSM-based reasoning and process feedback, enabling human supervision and domain adaptation.

item.title: An Efficient Memory Module for Graph Few-Shot Class-Incremental Learning
item.description: Mecoin: a novel memory module for efficient graph few-shot class-incremental learning, tackles catastrophic forgetting by employing structured memory units and a memory representation adaptation modul…

item.title: Assembly Fuzzy Representation on Hypergraph for Open-Set 3D Object Retrieval
item.description: Hypergraph-Based Assembly Fuzzy Representation (HAFR) excels at open-set 3D object retrieval by using part-level shapes and fuzzy representations to overcome challenges posed by unseen object categori…

item.title: Autonomous Agents for Collaborative Task under Information Asymmetry
item.description: iAgents: a novel multi-agent system leveraging LLMs, overcomes information asymmetry by mirroring human social networks to enable effective collaboration in complex tasks, achieving high accuracy in d…

item.title: AutoTimes: Autoregressive Time Series Forecasters via Large Language Models
item.description: AutoTimes repurposes LLMs as autoregressive time series forecasters, achieving state-of-the-art results with minimal trainable parameters and faster training/inference.

item.title: Binocular-Guided 3D Gaussian Splatting with View Consistency for Sparse View Synthesis
item.description: Binocular-guided 3D Gaussian splatting with self-supervision generates high-quality novel views from sparse inputs without external priors, significantly outperforming state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: BoostAdapter: Improving Vision-Language Test-Time Adaptation via Regional Bootstrapping
item.description: BoostAdapter enhances vision-language model test-time adaptation by combining instance-agnostic historical samples with instance-aware boosting samples for superior out-of-distribution and cross-domai…

item.title: Boosting the Potential of Large Language Models with an Intelligent Information Assistant
item.description: Boosting LLMs with an intelligent information assistant, ASSISTRAG, significantly improves accuracy and reasoning, especially for less advanced models.

item.title: Bridging Multicalibration and Out-of-distribution Generalization Beyond Covariate Shift
item.description: New model-agnostic framework for out-of-distribution generalization uses multicalibration across overlapping groups, showing improved robustness and prediction under various distribution shifts.

item.title: Bridging the Divide: Reconsidering Softmax and Linear Attention
item.description: InLine attention, a novel method, bridges the performance gap between softmax and linear attention by incorporating injectivity and local modeling, achieving superior performance while maintaining lin…

item.title: C-GAIL: Stabilizing Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning with Control Theory
item.description: C-GAIL stabilizes Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning by applying control theory, resulting in faster convergence, reduced oscillation, and better expert policy matching.

item.title: Can LLMs Learn by Teaching for Better Reasoning? A Preliminary Study
item.description: LLMs can improve reasoning by teaching weaker models, a process called Learning by Teaching (LbT), as shown in this preliminary study. LbT enhances not just student models, but also the teacher model…

item.title: Closed-Loop Visuomotor Control with Generative Expectation for Robotic Manipulation
item.description: CLOVER: A closed-loop visuomotor framework using generative visual plans & feedback mechanisms achieves state-of-the-art results in long-horizon robotic manipulation tasks.

item.title: Co-occurrence is not Factual Association in Language Models
item.description: Language models struggle to learn facts; this study reveals they prioritize word co-occurrence over true factual associations, proposing new training strategies for improved factual knowledge generali…

item.title: Consistency Diffusion Bridge Models
item.description: Consistency Diffusion Bridge Models (CDBMs) dramatically speed up diffusion bridge model sampling by learning a consistency function, achieving up to a 50x speedup with improved sample quality.

item.title: Contextual Linear Optimization with Bandit Feedback
item.description: This paper introduces induced empirical risk minimization for contextual linear optimization with bandit feedback, providing theoretical guarantees and computationally tractable solutions for improved…

item.title: CooHOI: Learning Cooperative Human-Object Interaction with Manipulated Object Dynamics
item.description: CooHOI: A two-phase learning framework enables physically simulated characters to perform cooperative object transportation tasks naturally and efficiently, overcoming the limitations of existing meth…

item.title: COSMIC: Compress Satellite Image Efficiently via Diffusion Compensation
item.description: COSMIC efficiently compresses satellite images via a lightweight encoder and diffusion compensation, enabling practical onboard processing and high compression ratios.

item.title: COVE: Unleashing the Diffusion Feature Correspondence for Consistent Video Editing
item.description: COVE: Consistent high-quality video editing achieved by leveraging diffusion feature correspondence for temporal consistency.

item.title: DARNet: Dual Attention Refinement Network with Spatiotemporal Construction for Auditory Attention Detection
item.description: DARNet: a dual attention network for auditory attention detection surpasses current state-of-the-art models, especially in short decision windows, achieving this with a 91% reduction in parameters.

item.title: DART-Math: Difficulty-Aware Rejection Tuning for Mathematical Problem-Solving
item.description: DART-Math tackles LLM limitations in mathematical problem-solving by introducing Difficulty-Aware Rejection Tuning, a novel method that generates high-quality, bias-reduced datasets, resulting in supe…

item.title: DDN: Dual-domain Dynamic Normalization for Non-stationary Time Series Forecasting
item.description: DDN: Dual-domain Dynamic Normalization dynamically improves time series forecasting accuracy by addressing data distribution changes in both time and frequency domains via a plug-in module.

item.title: Decoding-Time Language Model Alignment with Multiple Objectives
item.description: Multi-objective decoding (MOD) efficiently aligns language models to diverse user needs by decoding the next token from a weighted combination of predictions from multiple base models trained on indiv…

item.title: DeepLag: Discovering Deep Lagrangian Dynamics for Intuitive Fluid Prediction
item.description: DeepLag improves fluid prediction by uniquely combining Lagrangian and Eulerian perspectives, tracking key particles to reveal hidden dynamics and improve prediction accuracy.

item.title: DeformableTST: Transformer for Time Series Forecasting without Over-reliance on Patching
item.description: DeformableTST: a new Transformer model for time series forecasting that surpasses existing methods by reducing over-reliance on patching, enhancing performance and adaptability.

item.title: Demystify Mamba in Vision: A Linear Attention Perspective
item.description: Vision’s Mamba model demystified: Researchers unveil its surprising link to linear attention, improving efficiency and accuracy through design enhancements.

item.title: Dense Connector for MLLMs
item.description: Boosting multimodal LLMs, the Dense Connector efficiently integrates multi-layer visual features for significantly enhanced performance.

item.title: DI-MaskDINO: A Joint Object Detection and Instance Segmentation Model
item.description: DI-MaskDINO: Novel model significantly boosts object detection & instance segmentation accuracy by addressing performance imbalance using a De-Imbalance module and Balance-Aware Tokens Optimization.

item.title: Diffusion Actor-Critic with Entropy Regulator
item.description: DACER, a novel online RL algorithm, uses diffusion models to learn complex policies and adaptively balances exploration-exploitation via entropy estimation, achieving state-of-the-art performance on M…

item.title: Diffusion Models are Certifiably Robust Classifiers
item.description: Diffusion models are certifiably robust classifiers due to their inherent O(1) Lipschitzness, a property further enhanced by generalizing to noisy data, achieving over 80% certified robustness on CIFA…

item.title: Diffusion Tuning: Transferring Diffusion Models via Chain of Forgetting
item.description: Diff-Tuning: a simple yet effective approach transfers pre-trained diffusion models to various downstream tasks by leveraging the ‘chain of forgetting’ phenomenon, improving transferability and conver…

item.title: Dissect Black Box: Interpreting for Rule-Based Explanations in Unsupervised Anomaly Detection
item.description: SCD-Tree & GBD: Unlocking interpretable rules for unsupervised anomaly detection!

item.title: Distribution-Aware Data Expansion with Diffusion Models
item.description: DistDiff, a training-free data expansion framework, leverages distribution-aware diffusion models to generate high-fidelity, diverse samples that enhance downstream model performance.

item.title: DiTFastAttn: Attention Compression for Diffusion Transformer Models
item.description: DiTFastAttn: A post-training compression method drastically speeds up diffusion transformer models by cleverly reducing redundancy in attention calculations, leading to up to a 1.8x speedup at high re…

item.title: Doubly Mild Generalization for Offline Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Doubly Mild Generalization (DMG) improves offline reinforcement learning by selectively leveraging generalization beyond training data, achieving state-of-the-art results.

item.title: Dual Critic Reinforcement Learning under Partial Observability
item.description: DCRL, a Dual Critic Reinforcement Learning framework, effectively mitigates high variance in reinforcement learning under partial observability by synergistically combining an oracle critic (with full…

item.title: DuQuant: Distributing Outliers via Dual Transformation Makes Stronger Quantized LLMs
item.description: DuQuant: Dual transformations distribute outliers for stronger quantized LLMs.

item.title: Elucidating the Design Space of Dataset Condensation
item.description: Elucidating Dataset Condensation (EDC) achieves state-of-the-art accuracy in dataset condensation by implementing soft category-aware matching and a smoothing learning rate schedule, improving model t…

item.title: ENAT: Rethinking Spatial-temporal Interactions in Token-based Image Synthesis
item.description: EfficientNAT: a novel approach to token-based image synthesis boosts performance and slashes computational costs by cleverly disentangling and optimizing spatial-temporal interactions between image to…

item.title: Enhancing Protein Mutation Effect Prediction through a Retrieval-Augmented Framework
item.description: Revolutionizing protein mutation effect prediction, this work introduces a retrieval-augmented framework achieving state-of-the-art accuracy by efficiently incorporating similar local structure inform…

item.title: Event-3DGS: Event-based 3D Reconstruction Using 3D Gaussian Splatting
item.description: Event-3DGS: First event-based 3D reconstruction using 3D Gaussian splatting, enabling high-quality, efficient, and robust 3D scene reconstruction in challenging real-world conditions.

item.title: Everyday Object Meets Vision-and-Language Navigation Agent via Backdoor
item.description: Researchers introduce object-aware backdoors in Vision-and-Language Navigation, enabling malicious behavior upon encountering specific objects, demonstrating the vulnerability of real-world AI agents.

item.title: Expanding Sparse Tuning for Low Memory Usage
item.description: SNELL: Sparse tuning with kerNElized LoRA achieves state-of-the-art parameter-efficient fine-tuning performance with drastically reduced memory usage.

item.title: Exploring Adversarial Robustness of Deep State Space Models
item.description: Deep state space models (SSMs) gain adversarial robustness through an adaptive scaling mechanism, improving performance without overfitting issues.

item.title: FedLPA: One-shot Federated Learning with Layer-Wise Posterior Aggregation
item.description: FedLPA: One-shot federated learning with layer-wise posterior aggregation improves model accuracy in non-IID data by efficiently aggregating layer-wise posteriors of local models using a novel approac…

item.title: FlowTurbo: Towards Real-time Flow-Based Image Generation with Velocity Refiner
item.description: FlowTurbo: Blazing-fast, high-quality flow-based image generation via a velocity refiner!

item.title: From Trojan Horses to Castle Walls: Unveiling Bilateral Data Poisoning Effects in Diffusion Models
item.description: Diffusion models, while excelling in image generation, are vulnerable to data poisoning. This paper demonstrates a BadNets-like attack’s effectiveness against diffusion models, causing image misalign…

item.title: Full-Atom Peptide Design with Geometric Latent Diffusion
item.description: PepGLAD, a novel generative model, revolutionizes full-atom peptide design by leveraging geometric latent diffusion to significantly enhance peptide diversity and binding affinity.

item.title: Full-Distance Evasion of Pedestrian Detectors in the Physical World
item.description: Researchers developed Full Distance Attack (FDA) to generate adversarial patterns effective against pedestrian detectors across all distances, resolving the appearance gap issue between simulated and …

item.title: Functionally Constrained Algorithm Solves Convex Simple Bilevel Problem
item.description: Near-optimal algorithms solve convex simple bilevel problems by reformulating them into functionally constrained problems, achieving near-optimal convergence rates.

item.title: Gaussian Graph Network: Learning Efficient and Generalizable Gaussian Representations from Multi-view Images
item.description: Gaussian Graph Network (GGN) revolutionizes novel view synthesis by efficiently generating generalizable Gaussian representations from multi-view images, achieving superior rendering quality with fewe…

item.title: GaussianCube: A Structured and Explicit Radiance Representation for 3D Generative Modeling
item.description: GaussianCube revolutionizes 3D generative modeling with a structured, explicit radiance representation, achieving state-of-the-art results using significantly fewer parameters.

item.title: GenArtist: Multimodal LLM as an Agent for Unified Image Generation and Editing
item.description: GenArtist uses a multimodal large language model as an AI agent to unify image generation and editing, achieving state-of-the-art performance by decomposing complex tasks and leveraging a comprehensiv…

item.title: GeoLRM: Geometry-Aware Large Reconstruction Model for High-Quality 3D Gaussian Generation
item.description: GeoLRM: Generate stunning 3D models from just 21 images using a novel geometry-aware transformer, surpassing existing methods in efficiency and quality!

item.title: GLinSAT: The General Linear Satisfiability Neural Network Layer By Accelerated Gradient Descent
item.description: GLinSAT: A novel neural network layer efficiently solves general linear constraint satisfaction problems via accelerated gradient descent, enabling differentiable backpropagation and improved GPU perf…

item.title: GO4Align: Group Optimization for Multi-Task Alignment
item.description: GO4Align: Dynamically aligning multi-task learning to conquer task imbalance with superior efficiency!

item.title: Graph-enhanced Optimizers for Structure-aware Recommendation Embedding Evolution
item.description: SEvo, a novel embedding update mechanism, directly injects graph structural information into recommendation embeddings, boosting performance significantly while avoiding the computational overhead of …

item.title: GuardT2I: Defending Text-to-Image Models from Adversarial Prompts
item.description: GuardT2I: A novel framework defends text-to-image models against adversarial prompts by translating latent guidance embeddings into natural language, enabling effective adversarial prompt detection wi…

item.title: HLM-Cite: Hybrid Language Model Workflow for Text-based Scientific Citation Prediction
item.description: HLM-Cite: A hybrid language model workflow boosts scientific citation prediction accuracy by 17.6% and scales to 100K candidate papers, surpassing existing methods.

item.title: Identifying and Solving Conditional Image Leakage in Image-to-Video Diffusion Model
item.description: Researchers solve the conditional image leakage problem in image-to-video diffusion models by proposing a new inference strategy and a time-dependent noise distribution for training. This yields video…

item.title: ImOV3D: Learning Open Vocabulary Point Clouds 3D Object Detection from Only 2D Images
item.description: ImOV3D: Revolutionizing open-vocabulary 3D object detection by learning from 2D images alone!

item.title: Improving Adaptivity via Over-Parameterization in Sequence Models
item.description: Over-parameterized gradient descent dynamically adapts to signal structure, improving sequence model generalization and outperforming fixed-kernel methods.

item.title: Inferring Neural Signed Distance Functions by Overfitting on Single Noisy Point Clouds through Finetuning Data-Driven based Priors
item.description: This research presents LocalN2NM, a novel method for inferring neural signed distance functions (SDF) from single, noisy point clouds by finetuning data-driven priors, achieving faster inference and b…

item.title: InfLLM: Training-Free Long-Context Extrapolation for LLMs with an Efficient Context Memory
item.description: InfLLM: Training-free long-context extrapolation for LLMs via efficient context memory.

item.title: Instruction-Guided Visual Masking
item.description: Instruction-Guided Visual Masking (IVM) boosts multimodal instruction following by precisely focusing models on relevant image regions via visual masking, achieving state-of-the-art results on multipl…

item.title: iVideoGPT: Interactive VideoGPTs are Scalable World Models
item.description: iVideoGPT: A scalable, interactive world model trained on millions of human & robot manipulation videos, enabling efficient video prediction and model-based reinforcement learning.

item.title: LCM: Locally Constrained Compact Point Cloud Model for Masked Point Modeling
item.description: LCM: a novel, locally constrained, compact point cloud model surpasses Transformer-based methods by significantly improving performance and efficiency in various downstream tasks.

item.title: Learning 1D Causal Visual Representation with De-focus Attention Networks
item.description: De-focus Attention Networks achieve comparable performance to 2D non-causal models using 1D causal visual representation, solving the ‘over-focus’ issue in existing 1D causal vision models.

item.title: Learning Cooperative Trajectory Representations for Motion Forecasting
item.description: V2X-Graph: a novel cooperative motion forecasting framework achieving interpretable trajectory feature fusion for enhanced accuracy.

item.title: LoRA-GA: Low-Rank Adaptation with Gradient Approximation
item.description: LoRA-GA: A novel initialization method dramatically speeds up low-rank adaptation (LoRA) for LLMs, achieving convergence rates comparable to full fine-tuning while improving performance.

item.title: Make Continual Learning Stronger via C-Flat
item.description: Boost continual learning with C-Flat: a novel, one-line-code optimizer creating flatter loss landscapes for enhanced stability and generalization across various continual learning scenarios.

item.title: Make-An-Agent: A Generalizable Policy Network Generator with Behavior-Prompted Diffusion
item.description: Make-An-Agent generates high-performing robotic control policies from single behavioral demonstrations using behavior-prompted diffusion, showcasing impressive generalization and real-world applicabil…

item.title: MambaTalk: Efficient Holistic Gesture Synthesis with Selective State Space Models
item.description: MambaTalk: Efficient holistic gesture synthesis using selective state space models to overcome computational complexity and improve gesture quality.

item.title: Membership Inference Attacks against Fine-tuned Large Language Models via Self-prompt Calibration
item.description: SPV-MIA, a novel membership inference attack, significantly improves the accuracy of identifying training data in fine-tuned LLMs by using self-prompt calibration and probabilistic variation.

item.title: Mesa-Extrapolation: A Weave Position Encoding Method for Enhanced Extrapolation in LLMs
item.description: Mesa-Extrapolation enhances LLM extrapolation using a novel weave position encoding method, boosting performance while significantly reducing memory and inference time.

item.title: MSAGPT: Neural Prompting Protein Structure Prediction via MSA Generative Pre-Training
item.description: MSAGPT: Revolutionizing protein structure prediction by generating accurate virtual MSAs from limited data, boosting prediction accuracy by up to +8.5% TM-Score!

item.title: MSPE: Multi-Scale Patch Embedding Prompts Vision Transformers to Any Resolution
item.description: MSPE empowers Vision Transformers to handle any image resolution by cleverly optimizing patch embedding, achieving superior performance on low-resolution images and comparable results on high-resoluti…

item.title: Multi-scale Consistency for Robust 3D Registration via Hierarchical Sinkhorn Tree
item.description: Hierarchical Sinkhorn Tree (HST) robustly retrieves accurate 3D point cloud correspondences using multi-scale consistency, outperforming state-of-the-art methods.

item.title: MultiPull: Detailing Signed Distance Functions by Pulling Multi-Level Queries at Multi-Step
item.description: MultiPull: a novel method reconstructing detailed 3D surfaces from raw point clouds using multi-step optimization of multi-level features, significantly improving accuracy and detail.

item.title: MutaPLM: Protein Language Modeling for Mutation Explanation and Engineering
item.description: MutaPLM: a novel protein language model, provides human-understandable mutation explanations and designs novel mutations with desirable properties using a unique protein delta network and chain-of-tho…

item.title: Neural Collapse Inspired Feature Alignment for Out-of-Distribution Generalization
item.description: Neural Collapse-inspired Feature Alignment (NCFAL) significantly boosts out-of-distribution generalization by aligning semantic features to a simplex ETF, even without environment labels.

item.title: Neural Residual Diffusion Models for Deep Scalable Vision Generation
item.description: Neural-RDM: A novel framework for deep, scalable vision generation using residual diffusion models, achieving state-of-the-art results on image and video benchmarks.

item.title: Neural Signed Distance Function Inference through Splatting 3D Gaussians Pulled on Zero-Level Set
item.description: Neural SDF inference is revolutionized by dynamically aligning 3D Gaussians to a neural SDF’s zero-level set, enabling accurate, smooth 3D surface reconstruction.

item.title: Noise Contrastive Alignment of Language Models with Explicit Rewards
item.description: This paper introduces InfoNCA and NCA, novel frameworks for language model alignment using noise contrastive estimation, enabling direct optimization from both explicit rewards and pairwise preference…

item.title: Not All Tokens Are What You Need for Pretraining
item.description: RHO-1, a novel language model, uses selective pretraining focusing on high-value tokens, achieving state-of-the-art results with significantly less data than existing models.

item.title: ODGEN: Domain-specific Object Detection Data Generation with Diffusion Models
item.description: ODGEN: Boosting object detection accuracy by generating high-quality synthetic images using diffusion models conditioned on bounding boxes and text descriptions.

item.title: Offline Reinforcement Learning with OOD State Correction and OOD Action Suppression
item.description: Offline RL agents often fail in real-world scenarios due to unseen test states. SCAS, a novel method, simultaneously corrects OOD states to high-value, in-distribution states and suppresses risky OOD …

item.title: On the Impacts of the Random Initialization in the Neural Tangent Kernel Theory
item.description: Standard initialization in neural networks negatively impacts generalization ability under Neural Tangent Kernel theory, contradicting real-world performance, urging the development of improved theore…

item.title: On the Saturation Effects of Spectral Algorithms in Large Dimensions
item.description: High-dimensional spectral algorithms show saturation effects: Kernel Ridge Regression underperforms optimal algorithms like gradient flow when regression functions are very smooth.

item.title: One for All: Multi-Domain Joint Training for Point Cloud Based 3D Object Detection
item.description: OneDet3D: A universal 3D object detector trained jointly on diverse indoor/outdoor datasets, achieving one-for-all performance across domains and categories.

item.title: Online Control with Adversarial Disturbance for Continuous-time Linear Systems
item.description: This paper presents a novel two-level online control algorithm that learns to control continuous-time linear systems under adversarial disturbances, achieving sublinear regret.

item.title: Parameter Efficient Adaptation for Image Restoration with Heterogeneous Mixture-of-Experts
item.description: AdaptIR: A novel parameter-efficient method for generalized image restoration using a heterogeneous Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) architecture that achieves superior performance and generalization.

item.title: Parameter-Inverted Image Pyramid Networks
item.description: Parameter-Inverted Image Pyramid Networks (PIIP) boost image pyramid efficiency by using smaller models for higher-resolution images and larger models for lower-resolution ones, achieving superior per…

item.title: PEAC: Unsupervised Pre-training for Cross-Embodiment Reinforcement Learning
item.description: PEAC: a novel unsupervised pre-training method significantly improves cross-embodiment generalization in reinforcement learning, enabling faster adaptation to diverse robots and tasks.

item.title: PhyRecon: Physically Plausible Neural Scene Reconstruction
item.description: PHYRECON: A novel neural scene reconstruction method uses differentiable rendering and physics simulation for physically plausible 3D models.

item.title: Prediction with Action: Visual Policy Learning via Joint Denoising Process
item.description: PAD, a novel visual policy learning framework, unifies image prediction and robot action in a joint denoising process, achieving significant performance improvements in robotic manipulation tasks.

item.title: Q-VLM: Post-training Quantization for Large Vision-Language Models
item.description: Q-VLM: A novel post-training quantization framework significantly compresses large vision-language models, boosting inference speed without sacrificing accuracy.

item.title: Real-world Image Dehazing with Coherence-based Pseudo Labeling and Cooperative Unfolding Network
item.description: CORUN-Colabator: a novel cooperative unfolding network and coherence-based label generator achieves state-of-the-art real-world image dehazing by effectively integrating physical knowledge and generat…

item.title: RealCompo: Balancing Realism and Compositionality Improves Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: RealCompo: A novel training-free framework dynamically balances realism and compositionality in text-to-image generation, achieving state-of-the-art results.

item.title: Recovering Complete Actions for Cross-dataset Skeleton Action Recognition
item.description: Boost skeleton action recognition accuracy across datasets by recovering complete actions and resampling; outperforms existing methods.

item.title: ReFIR: Grounding Large Restoration Models with Retrieval Augmentation
item.description: ReFIR enhances Large Restoration Models’ accuracy by incorporating retrieved images as external knowledge, mitigating hallucination without retraining.

item.title: Reprogramming Pretrained Target-Specific Diffusion Models for Dual-Target Drug Design
item.description: AI-powered dual-target drug design is revolutionized by repurposing pretrained diffusion models, achieving zero-shot transfer learning and outperforming existing methods.

item.title: ReST-MCTS*: LLM Self-Training via Process Reward Guided Tree Search
item.description: ReST-MCTS*: A novel LLM self-training method using process reward guided tree search, outperforming existing methods by generating higher-quality reasoning traces for improved model accuracy.

item.title: Revisiting motion information for RGB-Event tracking with MOT philosophy
item.description: RGB-Event tracker CSAM leverages MOT philosophy for enhanced robustness by integrating appearance and motion information from RGB and event streams, achieving state-of-the-art performance.

item.title: RoPINN: Region Optimized Physics-Informed Neural Networks
item.description: ROPINN: Revolutionizing Physics-Informed Neural Networks with Region Optimization

item.title: S-STE: Continuous Pruning Function for Efficient 2:4 Sparse Pre-training
item.description: S-STE achieves efficient 2:4 sparse pre-training by introducing a novel continuous pruning function, overcoming the limitations of previous methods and leading to improved accuracy and speed.

item.title: Scalable Bayesian Optimization via Focalized Sparse Gaussian Processes
item.description: FOCALBO, a hierarchical Bayesian optimization algorithm using focalized sparse Gaussian processes, efficiently tackles high-dimensional problems with massive datasets, achieving state-of-the-art perfo…

item.title: Scaling Law for Time Series Forecasting
item.description: Unlocking the potential of deep learning for time series forecasting: this study reveals a scaling law influenced by dataset size, model complexity, and the crucial look-back horizon, leading to impro…

item.title: Semi-Open 3D Object Retrieval via Hierarchical Equilibrium on Hypergraph
item.description: HERT: a novel framework for semi-open 3D object retrieval using hierarchical hypergraph equilibrium, achieving state-of-the-art performance on four new benchmark datasets.

item.title: SG-Nav: Online 3D Scene Graph Prompting for LLM-based Zero-shot Object Navigation
item.description: SG-Nav achieves state-of-the-art zero-shot object navigation by leveraging a novel 3D scene graph to provide rich context for LLM-based reasoning.

item.title: ShowMaker: Creating High-Fidelity 2D Human Video via Fine-Grained Diffusion Modeling
item.description: ShowMaker: Generating high-fidelity 2D human conversational videos using fine-grained diffusion modeling and 2D key points.

item.title: Skinned Motion Retargeting with Dense Geometric Interaction Perception
item.description: MeshRet: A novel retargeting framework that uses dense geometric interaction modeling for realistic, artifact-free skinned character animation.

item.title: SMART: Scalable Multi-agent Real-time Motion Generation via Next-token Prediction
item.description: SMART: a scalable, real-time multi-agent driving simulator using next-token prediction, achieves state-of-the-art results and zero-shot generalization.

item.title: Stabilizing Zero-Shot Prediction: A Novel Antidote to Forgetting in Continual Vision-Language Tasks
item.description: ZAF: a novel replay-free continual learning method for vision-language models, significantly reduces forgetting by stabilizing zero-shot predictions.

item.title: SuperVLAD: Compact and Robust Image Descriptors for Visual Place Recognition
item.description: SuperVLAD: A new visual place recognition method boasts superior robustness and compactness, outperforming state-of-the-art techniques by significantly reducing parameters and dimensions.

item.title: TimeXer: Empowering Transformers for Time Series Forecasting with Exogenous Variables
item.description: TimeXer empowers transformers for superior time series forecasting by cleverly integrating exogenous variables, achieving state-of-the-art results on diverse benchmarks.

item.title: Training an Open-Vocabulary Monocular 3D Detection Model without 3D Data
item.description: Train open-vocabulary 3D object detectors using only RGB images and large language models, achieving state-of-the-art performance without expensive LiDAR data.

item.title: Training Compute-Optimal Protein Language Models
item.description: Compute-optimal protein language models are trained efficiently using scaling laws derived from a massive dataset, improving performance while optimizing compute budgets.

item.title: Unchosen Experts Can Contribute Too: Unleashing MoE Models‚Äô Power by Self-Contrast
item.description: Self-Contrast Mixture-of-Experts (SCMoE) boosts MoE model reasoning by cleverly using ‘unchosen’ experts during inference. This training-free method contrasts outputs from strong and weak expert acti…

item.title: Understanding Emergent Abilities of Language Models from the Loss Perspective
item.description: Language model emergent abilities aren’t exclusive to large models; they emerge when pre-training loss falls below a threshold, irrespective of model or data size.

item.title: Uni-Med: A Unified Medical Generalist Foundation Model For Multi-Task Learning Via Connector-MoE
item.description: Uni-Med, a novel unified medical foundation model, tackles multi-task learning challenges by using Connector-MoE to efficiently bridge modalities, achieving competitive performance across six medical …

item.title: UniAudio 1.5: Large Language Model-Driven Audio Codec is A Few-Shot Audio Task Learner
item.description: UniAudio 1.5 uses a novel LLM-driven audio codec to enable frozen LLMs to perform various audio tasks with just a few examples, opening new avenues for efficient few-shot cross-modal learning.

item.title: UniGAD: Unifying Multi-level Graph Anomaly Detection
item.description: UniGAD unifies multi-level graph anomaly detection, improving accuracy and zero-shot transferability by jointly modeling node, edge, and graph anomalies via a novel subgraph sampler and GraphStitch Ne…

item.title: Unique3D: High-Quality and Efficient 3D Mesh Generation from a Single Image
item.description: Unique3D: Single image to high-fidelity 3D mesh in 30 seconds!

item.title: Unleashing the Denoising Capability of Diffusion Prior for Solving Inverse Problems
item.description: ProjDiff: A novel algorithm unleashes diffusion models’ denoising power for superior inverse problem solutions.

item.title: Value-Based Deep Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning with Dynamic Sparse Training
item.description: MAST: Train ultra-sparse deep MARL agents with minimal performance loss!

item.title: Vision Model Pre-training on Interleaved Image-Text Data via Latent Compression Learning
item.description: Latent Compression Learning (LCL) revolutionizes vision model pre-training by effectively leveraging readily available interleaved image-text data, achieving performance comparable to models trained o…

item.title: VisionLLM v2: An End-to-End Generalist Multimodal Large Language Model for Hundreds of Vision-Language Tasks
item.description: VisionLLM v2 unifies visual perception, understanding, and generation, excelling in various vision tasks and achieving performance comparable to task-specific models.

item.title: XMask3D: Cross-modal Mask Reasoning for Open Vocabulary 3D Semantic Segmentation
item.description: XMask3D uses cross-modal mask reasoning to achieve state-of-the-art open vocabulary 3D semantic segmentation by aligning 2D and 3D features at the mask level, resulting in precise segmentation boundar…

item.title: YOLOv10: Real-Time End-to-End Object Detection
item.description: YOLOv10: Real-time object detection achieves state-of-the-art speed and accuracy by eliminating NMS post-processing and holistically optimizing model architecture for efficiency and accuracy.

item.title: You Only Cache Once: Decoder-Decoder Architectures for Language Models
item.description: YOCO: A decoder-decoder architecture for LLMs dramatically reduces memory usage and improves inference speed by caching key-value pairs only once.

item.title: Zero-Shot Scene Reconstruction from Single Images with Deep Prior Assembly
item.description: Zero-shot 3D scene reconstruction from single images is achieved by assembling diverse deep priors from large models, eliminating the need for 3D/2D training data and achieving superior performance.
